module.name: HTML
module.param:
System RAS Metrics

Availability, System Mean Time to Interrupt (SMTTI), and Job Mean Time To Interrupt (JMTTI) metrics are sliding averages based on the following parameters.

module.name: Search
module.param: | eventcount summarize=false | search index=hpc_* | eval system=ltrim(index,"hpc_") | fields system

module.name: TextField
module.param: Total number of days in report:

module.name: TextField
module.param: Number of days used to calculate sliding averages:

module.name: PostProcess
module.param: timechart span=1d max(USR_hrs) AS ProductionUptime max(SYS_hrs) AS ScheduledDowntime max(ERR_hrs) AS UnscheduledDowntime

module.name: PostProcess
module.group: SMTTI = ProductionUptime hours / Count of UnscheduledDowntimeStarts
module.param: streamstats sum(USR_hrs) AS USRhoursInWindow window=$windays$ | streamstats sum(ERR_count) AS ERRCountInWindow window=$windays$ | eval SMTTi=round(USRhoursInWindow/ERRCountInWindow,2) | streamstats count(_time) as ndays window=$windays$ | where ndays=$windays$ | eval SMTTI=if(isnull(SMTTi),USRhoursInWindow,SMTTi) | timechart span=1d max(SMTTI) AS SMTTI

module.name: PostProcess
module.param: streamstats sum(USR_hrs) AS USRhoursInWindow window=$windays$ | eval Avail=100*USRhoursInWindow/($windays$*24) | timechart span=1d max(Avail) AS Availability

module.name: PostProcess
module.group: JMTTI = ProductionUptime hours / Count of Jobs killed by nodes entering UnscheduledDowntime
module.param: join date type=outer [search index=summary orig_index=hpc_$SelectedSystem$ newState=ERR | lookup job host AS orig_host | where NOT isnull(jobid) | eval date=strftime(_time,"%Y-%m-%d") | stats count AS ERRcount by date ] | streamstats sum(USR_hrs) AS USRhoursInWindow window=$windays$ | streamstats sum(ERRcount) AS ERRcountInWindow window=$windays$ | eval JMTTI=USRhoursInWindow/ERRcountInWindow | timechart span=1d max(JMTTI) AS JMTTI

module.name: PostProcess
module.param: reverse | rename USR_hrs AS ProductionUptimeHrs | rename SYS_hrs AS ScheduledDowntimeHrs | rename ERR_hrs AS UnscheduledDowntimeHrs | rename ERR_count AS UnscheduledDowntimeStarts | table date ProductionUptimeHrs ScheduledDowntimeHrs UnscheduledDowntimeHrs UnscheduledDowntimeStarts
